extendedInfo.description: Focus@will is a new neuroscience based music service that helps increase your attention span up to 400% when working, studying, writing and reading.Itâs for anyone who needs to be productive on demand when working to a deadline. For instance, journalists, lawyers, students, writers and coders. Research has shown it is extremely effective for 2 out of 3 people.There are 3 levels of accounts, Guest, Personal and Pro. Unregistered Guest accounts are for quickly checking out the system. Free Personal accounts require registration and have access to more music and unlocked features. Paid Pro accounts are $3.99 per month or $34.99 per year and have access to the entire music library and all personalizing features.

reviews.title: Good. Needs work.
reviews.comment: I do not like how sometimes it takes forever to load the program. I often must restart my phone. And out will randomly stop playing occasionally, or when I open another app. But I really like it in general.
reviews.author: D.D. McCord

reviews.title: Annoying bug
reviews.comment: Unlike the iOS or web versions, the application has an annoying tendency to close in the background and stop playing when a new app is launched
reviews.author: Tom Bourega

reviews.title: Amazing app
reviews.comment: I loved the beta version except it was only in the PC, which meant I could not use it at work. Well now that it is an app, I can and love it. I can also now use this when my kids do homework, I know it sounds crazy, but they do better with it playing. Thank you for the great app.
reviews.author: James Johnston

reviews.title: The best on the web.
reviews.comment: As a web dev guy, I have tried all the relaxation sites to help me stay focused on long days of staring at php code.  I have yet to hear a song repeated, and the quality of the songs is HD (hi def).  I highly recommend this app and the website. Thank you for making this available.
reviews.author: Randy Hunt

reviews.title: Helps focus. Needs to stop auto closing.
reviews.comment: Great app. Wish it would stay open when switching to other parts of my phone. Android device.
reviews.author: Drew LaMonte

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Am enjoying using it. Will probably get the paid version soon.
reviews.author: Ron Russo

reviews.title: Full access?
reviews.comment: App gets full marks for a beautiful layout. The music/images are nicely chosen.   After installing the app and signing in, I\'m not getting the full access trial period as listed in the description. Would consider a subscription, but not unless I can try it out fully.
reviews.author: Chris Dinesen Rogers

reviews.title: Nicely priced and effective music service to help get things done.
reviews.comment: I don\'t recall how I stumbled upon Focus At Will, but it really does work for me. I use the web interface and this Android app with the same subscription. I turn it on and \"zone in\" (not \"zone out\") on the task I have at hand.
reviews.author: John Morton

reviews.title: I love it...
reviews.comment: ...but it stops playing constantly. Anytime I use a new app, or for no reason whatsoever, Focus @ Will closes and I have to restart it. Highly annoying bug that doesn\'t allow me to get \"in the zone.\"
reviews.author: Rudy Maga\303\261a

reviews.title: Epic! :-)
reviews.comment: Positive vibes and improves memory. Cant afford paid version but this is just fine. One suggestion, popout player. So when i am doing another task it wont cut off. Thanks.
reviews.author: Maria V

reviews.comment: This is by far the most comprehensive ambient sounds app I\'ve seen
reviews.author: Josh Coleman

reviews.comment: A tool of great worth - it says what it does... And does what it says.
reviews.author: Stephen McBroom

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This app does help me tremendously.
reviews.author: RAB MAN

reviews.title: Perfect for productivity
reviews.comment: Simply the best music to listen to while working. A little pricey for the service imho or would be 5 star.
reviews.author: Patrick McKenna

reviews.comment: Bug in the app
reviews.author: assaf avshayev

reviews.title: A Treasure
reviews.comment: Fantastic way to concentrate. All with great taste and science behind.
reviews.author: Marco Acero

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: Awsome right before bed on right in the morning. Love it
reviews.author: chris lynch

reviews.title: It works
reviews.comment: I have only used it twice, and both times it was late at night. I believe I already noticed a difference. I am truly excited about this website. I love science.
reviews.author: Debora Delgado

reviews.comment: Excellent App!!!
reviews.author: Adran Nakagawa

reviews.title: My review
reviews.comment: Use it to study baby!
reviews.author: Thomas Esquiere
